category-def.name: hostcategory
category-def.label: ECF Remote Management Eclipse Host
category-def.description: When installed, this feature allows Eclipse to host remote management services, allowing a client to remotely monitor and manage Eclipse.

category-def.name: clientcategory
category-def.label: ECF Remote Managment Eclipse Client
category-def.description: When installed, this feature allows Eclipse to consume remote management services, and show a user interface for a remote management host.
